document.full_text: laurent gbagbo remained under siege at his residence, but his forces took back territory and recaptured state television and radio from alassane ouattara's supporters.
document.title: gbagbo loyalists regain ground in ivory coast
lines_and_colors: laurent gbagbo remained under siege at his residence, but his forces took back territory and recaptured state television and radio from alassane ouattara's supporters.
